languages.text: "Это бы облегчило твое существование, ксенос, если бы служитель Лекса дал слабину и внял твоим гнилым речам. Но этого не будет".
"It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."
languages.original_text: "Это бы облегчило твое существование, ксенос, если бы служитель Лекса дал слабину и внял твоим гнилым речам. Но этого не будет".

traits.locale_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."
"It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."
"It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."
"It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."
"It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

languages.text: 「異種族よ、このレックスのしもべが弱さに屈し、お前の穢れた言葉に耳を貸せば、確かに、お前の生は少しは楽になるかもしれん。だが、そんなことは決して起こらない」
languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族よ、このレックスのしもべが弱さに屈し、お前の穢れた言葉に耳を貸せば、確かに、お前の生は少しは楽になるかもしれん。だが、そんなことは決して起こらない」

languages.text: "Es würde Euch die Existenz erleichtern, Xenos, wenn dieser Diener des Lex der Schwäche nachgäbe und Eurem schändlichen Rat folgte. Doch das wird nicht geschehen."
languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

traits.locale_text: "Es würde Euch die Existenz erleichtern, Xenos, wenn dieser Diener des Lex der Schwäche nachgäbe und Eurem schändlichen Rat folgte. Doch das wird nicht geschehen."

languages.text: « La vôtre le serait sûrement si le serviteur de la Lex que je suis cédait à la faiblesse et écoutait vos paroles sournoises, xénos. Mais ça n'arrivera pas. »
languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

traits.locale_text: « La vôtre le serait sûrement si le serviteur de la Lex que je suis cédait à la faiblesse et écoutait vos paroles sournoises, xénos. Mais ça n'arrivera pas. »

languages.text: «Y tu existencia sería más llevadera, xenos, si este siervo de la Lex fuese débil y se dejase influir por tu vil palabrería. Pero eso no va a pasar».
languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

traits.locale_text: «Y tu existencia sería más llevadera, xenos, si este siervo de la Lex fuese débil y se dejase influir por tu vil palabrería. Pero eso no va a pasar».

languages.text: “更轻松些的人恐怕是你，异形。如果律法的仆人屈从于软弱，听信你的异端邪说，你确实会更轻松些。不过，这种事情绝对不会发生。”
languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

traits.locale_text: “更轻松些的人恐怕是你，异形。如果律法的仆人屈从于软弱，听信你的异端邪说，你确实会更轻松些。不过，这种事情绝对不会发生。”

languages.text: "Bir Lex hizmetkârını zaafa düşürüp çirkin sözlerinle ayartmaya çalışıyorsun zeno. Şansına küs, çaban nafile."
languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Lex hizmetkârını zaafa düşürüp çirkin sözlerinle ayartmaya çalışıyorsun zeno. Şansına küs, çaban nafile."

languages.original_text: "It would ease your existence, xenos, if this servant of the Lex gave way to weakness and heeded your foul talk. But that is not going to happen."
